title: Mundo is the only champ that feels good to get mr on
body: And he boosts its stats by 40% unless its on mundo it legit feels like a waste of gold hopefully in the next season mr items get some love or base mr cause atm single mr items don't keep you from getting 1 shot once they have void might as well not buy mr at all and try to kill them faster not to mention most games only have 1-2 ap champs so getting mr already feels bad combined with the fact minions monsters towers do mostly physical damage .Also yes i think mundo is a bit over tuned .

replies.body: MR feels pretty good on {{champion:82}} .  Or anyone really when there's an AP threat on the enemy team.

MR + tenacity stacking is too good against ap comps...

Saying otherwise is totally wrong...

MR does it's job almost too well unlike armor nowadays...

Full ap comps are a guaranteed loss while full ad comps are not (well known and tested fact, unless the enemy team is just that bad)...

Please stop cluelessly parroting Hashinshin.

Mages sorc boots + orb rush can be completely countered by rushing just 1 MR component + MR flex runes & nullifying orb rune.

Mages CC can be rendered almost useless by how easily can tenacity be stacked. (%51 tenacity from just boots + tenacity rune).

Good luck trying to land W on stunned targets with early %51 tenacity as Veigar (same goes for all Mages who depend on landing thier CC to use thier combos)...
